section.section: To qualify for a license to practice as a cosmetologist, an applicant shall be an individual who meets the requirements of this section.
The applicant shall be at least 17 years old.
The applicant shall have completed successfully a 9th grade education or the equivalent.
Except as otherwise provided in this subsection, an applicant shall have received training by:
If an applicant is a barber or master barber currently licensed in this State, the Board shall:
An applicant meets the requirements of this subsection if:
Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, the applicant shall pass a written and practical examination given by the Board under this subtitle.

text.section:
To qualify for a license as a senior cosmetologist, an applicant shall:
have 2 years of experience as a licensed cosmetologist; and
pass an examination approved by the Board.
